text:
The President of Bangladesh Pediatric Association, @manzoor76200111, says #vaccine is a gifted opportunity to fight #COVID19 & requests everyone to #GetVaccinated when #Covidvaccine is available. 

#TrustYourVaccine #IPATrustVaccines @Asiapacific_Ped @amanpulungan #VaccinesWork https://t.co/X12Tsr11zA
